payload.message: Run the Mission Control dashboard data generator to refresh the dashboard. Execute: cd ~/.openclaw/workspace && node mission-control/generate-data.mjs ‚Äî Report the results. If it fails, report the error.

Check disk usage on the root volume. Run:

df -h / | tail -1

Parse the Use% column. If it is 50% or higher, send a warning via YOUR_CHANNEL to YOUR_PHONE using the message tool:

'üíæ Disk usage alert: [X]% used ([used] of [total]). [free] remaining.'

If under 50%, respond with NO_REPLY.

Run the smart session archiver to prevent dashboard overload. Execute: bash ~/.openclaw/workspace/skills/everclaw/scripts/session-archive.sh --verbose ‚Äî Report the results. If sessions were archived, mention the before/after size.
